Text:
Thank you IceBane to inclued french subtitle.

great quality on video and audio.
keep going on this way.

Thanks for the upload.  My wife has been bugging me on this one.

Do you know if this will play on iPad?  It wasn't listed on the compatible device on your page.

Thanks in advance.

Icebane your rips are awesome.  I just find with your rips the video at times becomes a little choppy, but not really bad. I haven't had this choppy video issue with lifechanger, secretmyth etc...

It might be a codec isssue.  I'm running Windows XP Professional SP3.  

If it is a codec issue with your rips what codecs should I have installed on my computer?

Thanks!
